snippet: Peter Westmacott, the British ambassador to the United States, responds to an Op-Ed article, “London’s Laundry Business.”
abstract: Letter from British Ambassador Peter Westmacott responds to March 8 Ben Judah Op-Ed article describing Great Britain as ready to betray the United States in its condemnation of Russian actions in Ukraine.
lead_paragraph: Peter Westmacott, the British ambassador to the United States, responds to an Op-Ed article, “London’s Laundry Business.”

headline.main: Russians in London, and the Crisis in Ukraine
headline.print_headline: Russians in London, and the Crisis in Ukraine
